title: Trey McBride catches most passes ever by a tight end
snippets: The Cardinals' Trey McBride set the NFL record for most receptions by a tight end (117) Sunday, passing the mark set by Zach Ertz in 2018.
McBride also broke the Cardinals' single-season receptions record

Tight end Trey McBride has been among the few bright spots in a difficult season for the Arizona Cardinals. McBride had 10 catches in Sunday's 37-14 loss at Cincinnati, giving him 119 this season to break the NFL single-season record for a tight end.

summary: Arizona Cardinals tight end Trey McBride set a new NFL single-season record for receptions by a tight end, reaching 119 catches after recording 10 in Sunday's 37-14 loss to Cincinnati. He surpassed the previous record of 116 set by Zach Ertz in 2018 and also broke the Cardinals' single-season receptions record.

Staios said the team would provide no further comments at this time. Ullmark, Ottawa’s No. 1 netminder, has a 14-8-5 record this season with a disappointing .881 save percentage and 2.95 goals-against average. TORONTO – After the Toronto Raptors and Golden State Warriors played each other on Sunday, the teams’ coaching staffs raised a glass in honour of their friend and colleague Dejan Milojevic. Milojevic was an assistant coach with Golden State when he died in January 2024 at the age of 46 after he had a heart attack during a team dinner in Salt Lake City. Central African Republic votes, Russia ally Touadera seeks third term Reuters

Opposition hopes to tap into frustrations of people living in country where conflict remains a daily reality Central African Republic goes to the polls on Sunday with the president, Faustin-Archange Touadéra, seeking a third term. titles: Central African Republic holds elections, President Touadera seeks third term
Central African Republic votes, Russia ally Touadera seeks third term - Reuters

constructiveness_reason: The story informs about the political situation in the Central African Republic, including the election process and the president's bid for a third term. summary: Central African Republic voters went to the polls as President Faustin-Archange Touadéra seeks a controversial third term. Elections are also being held for legislative, regional, and municipal representatives. About 2.3 million people are registered to vote amid ongoing conflict in the country. The opposition aims to capitalize on public frustrations. Voting is underway.

title: Cold weather alert as temperatures drop and snow expected in North
snippets: Temperatures will fall to lows of -4C in the North West of England, with snow expected in some areas.

UKHSA warns vulnerable and elderly people may be at risk with temperatures to drop severely overnight Amber cold health alerts have been issued for northern England, with low temperatures predicted to cause a “rise in deaths” among vulnerable and elderly people. The UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA)
titles: Cold weather to ring in New Year as amber health alerts issued
‘Rise in deaths’ predicted as amber cold health alerts issued in northern England
constructiveness_reason: This story provides useful information about weather conditions and health alerts, which can help readers make informed decisions. However, it does not report on solutions or improvements.
summary: Temperatures in the North West of England are expected to drop to -4°C, with snow forecast in some areas. The UK Health Security Agency (UKHSA) has issued amber cold health alerts for northern England, warning that vulnerable and elderly people may be at increased risk and that low temperatures could lead to a rise in deaths.

title: Many packaged foods have hidden added sugars experts say
snippets: People probably don’t know how much sugar they’re eating
Foods with healthy-sounding buzzwords could be hiding added sugar in plain sight AP News
titles: Foods with healthy-sounding buzzwords could be hiding added sugar in plain sight
Foods with healthy-sounding buzzwords could be hiding added sugar in plain sight - AP News
constructiveness_reason: This story is highly constructive as it provides actionable insights for readers about food labels and hidden sugars. It increases awareness about the food industry and can influence readers' decision-making regarding their diet.
summary: Many packaged foods labeled with healthy-sounding terms may contain hidden added sugars, according to recent reports. Experts say consumers often underestimate their sugar intake because added sugars are listed under different names on ingredient labels. Health officials recommend checking nutrition labels carefully to better track sugar consumption.

summary: Police have launched a murder investigation after David Darke, 66, died in hospital on Saturday following injuries sustained in an assault outside the Crown Inn in Appleby Magna. Darke was reportedly punched during the incident. His family has paid tribute to him as a devoted family man. The inquiry is ongoing.
